ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Jon S. Sigurdson ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. JON S. SIGURDSON, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective August 18, 2017.
